alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 29 at 7:32AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Evadale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 345 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Neches River near Evadale. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding expected with the boat ramps at Evadale possibly becoming inaccessible. Flooding can be expected in the low-lying areas of the Lakeview community in Orange County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Neches River Evadale 17.0 16.8 Mon 7 am CST 16.6 16.7 16.9 &&
